query:
WITH ranked_variants AS (
                    SELECT
                        dms.id,
                        dms.chunk,
                        dms.pos,
                        dms.p_value,
                        dms.created_at,
                        dms.log2_fold_change,
                        dms.log2_std_error,
                        dms.statistic,
                        dms.condition,
                        dms.aa,
                        dms.version,
                        proteins.protein,
                        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
                            PARTITION BY dms.pos
                            ORDER BY
                                CASE $5
                                    WHEN 'MostSignificantPValue' THEN dms.p_value
                                    WHEN 'LargestLog2FoldChange' THEN -dms.log2_fold_change
                                    WHEN 'LargestZStatistic' THEN -dms.statistic
                                    ELSE NULL
                                END ASC
                        ) AS rn
                    FROM dms
                    JOIN proteins ON dms.protein_id = proteins.id
                    WHERE proteins.protein = $1
                    AND dms.condition = $2
                )
                SELECT
                    id,
                    chunk,
                    pos,
                    p_value,
                    created_at,
                    log2_fold_change,
                    log2_std_error,
                    statistic,
                    condition,
                    aa,
                    version,
                    protein
                FROM ranked_variants
                WHERE rn = 1
                LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4
